doc.field: New York University Collection of Contemporary Composers' Websites
New York University Collection of Contemporary Composers' Websites

Christine Southworth (b. 1978) is a composer and video artist based in Lexington, Massachusetts. Her music incorporates natural and man/machine-made sound. The website contains compositions for string quartets, standard and non-standard ensembles, gamelan, and electronic; videos of performances; music videos; art; photography; her digital art FUNGIble Art, and performance listings. The URL changed in 2021.

Spider's Canvas/Arachnodrone is a co-creation of composer Evan Ziporyn, composer/visual artist Christine Southworth, sound artist Ian Hattwick, spider researcher Isabelle Su, in collaboration with artist Tom√°s Saraceno. The piece sonifies a virtual model of a spider's web.
Crawl was limited to domains and subdomains of christinesouthworth.com and kotekan.com in order to remain within the collection scope and data constraints.
